On that desperate night when her lover was stolen by her younger sister, Yuriel dreams of being embraced by an imperial hero, the Grand Duke Akron of Veiharz.

One day, after spending the night of joy in her dreams every day, Yuriel realizes that a new life has been settled in her stomach…>
